mapper.select:
select
distinct
from CARRIER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into CARRIER (ENTITY_ID, CARRIER_ID, CARRIER_STATE, PREV_CARRIER_STATE, CARRIER_TYPE_ID, CARRIER_SHAPE_ID, CURRENT_AMHS_ID, CURRENT_LOC_TYPE, CURRENT_LOC, HOST_ZONE_ID, SHELF_NO, PREV_AMHS_ID, PREV_CARRIER_LOC_TYPE, PREV_CARRIER_LOC, STORED_TIME, CARRIER_EMPTY, WAIT_IN_TIME, WAIT_OUT_TIME, INSYSTEM_CARRIER_ID, INSYSTEM_TIME, CARRIER_ALARM, PASSING_MODE, CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL, CLEAN_REQUEST, CONTAMI_ID, PURPOSE_TYPE, CARRIER_ACTION_TIME ) values (#{entityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prevCarrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carrierTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierShapeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currentAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentLocType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currentLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shelfNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prevAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prevCarrierLocType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prevCarrierLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storedTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{carrierEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{waitInTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{waitOutTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{insystemCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insystemTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{carrierAlarm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{passingMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carrierActionCtrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cleanRequest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contamiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purposeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierActionTime,jdbcType=OTHER} )

mapper.update:
update CARRIER
ENTITY_ID = #{record.entityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER_ID = #{record.carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER_STATE = #{record.carrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREV_CARRIER_STATE = #{record.prevCarrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARRIER_TYPE_ID = #{record.carrierTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER_SHAPE_ID = #{record.carrierShapeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CURRENT_AMHS_ID = #{record.currentAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_LOC_TYPE = #{record.currentLocType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CURRENT_LOC = #{record.currentLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOST_ZONE_ID = #{record.hostZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHELF_NO = #{record.shelfNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREV_AMHS_ID = #{record.prevAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREV_CARRIER_LOC_TYPE = #{record.prevCarrierLocType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREV_CARRIER_LOC = #{record.prevCarrierLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORED_TIME = #{record.storedTime,jdbcType=OTHER},
CARRIER_EMPTY = #{record.carrierEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAIT_IN_TIME = #{record.waitInTime,jdbcType=OTHER},
WAIT_OUT_TIME = #{record.waitOutTime,jdbcType=OTHER},
INSYSTEM_CARRIER_ID = #{record.insystemCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSYSTEM_TIME = #{record.insystemTime,jdbcType=OTHER},
CARRIER_ALARM = #{record.carrierAlarm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PASSING_MODE = #{record.passingMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL = #{record.carrierActionCtrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLEAN_REQUEST = #{record.cleanRequest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTAMI_ID = #{record.contamiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURPOSE_TYPE = #{record.purposeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER_ACTION_TIME = #{record.carrierActionTime,jdbcType=OTHER},

update CARRIER set ENTITY_ID = #{record.entityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER_ID = #{record.carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER_STATE = #{record.carrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PREV_CARRIER_STATE = #{record.prevCarrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CARRIER_TYPE_ID = #{record.carrierTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER_SHAPE_ID = #{record.carrierShapeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_AMHS_ID = #{record.currentAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_LOC_TYPE = #{record.currentLocType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_LOC = #{record.currentLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOST_ZONE_ID = #{record.hostZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHELF_NO = #{record.shelfNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREV_AMHS_ID = #{record.prevAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREV_CARRIER_LOC_TYPE = #{record.prevCarrierLocType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PREV_CARRIER_LOC = #{record.prevCarrierLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORED_TIME = #{record.storedTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, CARRIER_EMPTY = #{record.carrierEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WAIT_IN_TIME = #{record.waitInTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, WAIT_OUT_TIME = #{record.waitOutTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, INSYSTEM_CARRIER_ID = #{record.insystemCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSYSTEM_TIME = #{record.insystemTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, CARRIER_ALARM = #{record.carrierAlarm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PASSING_MODE = #{record.passingMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL = #{record.carrierActionCtrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLEAN_REQUEST = #{record.cleanRequest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTAMI_ID = #{record.contamiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURPOSE_TYPE = #{record.purposeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER_ACTION_TIME = #{record.carrierActionTime,jdbcType=OTHER}

update CARRIER
CARRIER_ID = #{carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER_STATE = #{carrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREV_CARRIER_STATE = #{prevCarrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARRIER_TYPE_ID = #{carrierTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER_SHAPE_ID = #{carrierShapeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CURRENT_AMHS_ID = #{currentAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_LOC_TYPE = #{currentLocType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CURRENT_LOC = #{currentLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOST_ZONE_ID = #{hostZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHELF_NO = #{shelfNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREV_AMHS_ID = #{prevAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREV_CARRIER_LOC_TYPE = #{prevCarrierLocType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREV_CARRIER_LOC = #{prevCarrierLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORED_TIME = #{storedTime,jdbcType=OTHER},
CARRIER_EMPTY = #{carrierEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAIT_IN_TIME = #{waitInTime,jdbcType=OTHER},
WAIT_OUT_TIME = #{waitOutTime,jdbcType=OTHER},
INSYSTEM_CARRIER_ID = #{insystemCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSYSTEM_TIME = #{insystemTime,jdbcType=OTHER},
CARRIER_ALARM = #{carrierAlarm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PASSING_MODE = #{passingMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL = #{carrierActionCtrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLEAN_REQUEST = #{cleanRequest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTAMI_ID = #{contamiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURPOSE_TYPE = #{purposeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER_ACTION_TIME = #{carrierActionTime,jdbcType=OTHER},
where ENTITY_ID = #{entityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CARRIER set CARRIER_ID = #{carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER_STATE = #{carrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PREV_CARRIER_STATE = #{prevCarrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CARRIER_TYPE_ID = #{carrierTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER_SHAPE_ID = #{carrierShapeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_AMHS_ID = #{currentAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_LOC_TYPE = #{currentLocType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_LOC = #{currentLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOST_ZONE_ID = #{hostZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHELF_NO = #{shelfNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREV_AMHS_ID = #{prevAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREV_CARRIER_LOC_TYPE = #{prevCarrierLocType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PREV_CARRIER_LOC = #{prevCarrierLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORED_TIME = #{storedTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, CARRIER_EMPTY = #{carrierEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WAIT_IN_TIME = #{waitInTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, WAIT_OUT_TIME = #{waitOutTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, INSYSTEM_CARRIER_ID = #{insystemCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSYSTEM_TIME = #{insystemTime,jdbcType=OTHER}, CARRIER_ALARM = #{carrierAlarm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PASSING_MODE = #{passingMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL = #{carrierActionCtrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLEAN_REQUEST = #{cleanRequest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTAMI_ID = #{contamiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURPOSE_TYPE = #{purposeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER_ACTION_TIME = #{carrierActionTime,jdbcType=OTHER} where ENTITY_ID = #{entityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: ENTITY_ID, CARRIER_ID, CARRIER_STATE, CARRIER_STATE_CODE, PREV_CARRIER_STATE, CARRIER_TYPE_ID, CARRIER_SHAPE_ID, CURRENT_AMHS_ID, CURRENT_LOC, HOST_ZONE_ID, SHELF_NO, PREV_AMHS_ID, PREV_CARRIER_LOC, STORED_TIME, CARRIER_EMPTY, WAIT_IN_TIME, WAIT_OUT_TIME, INSYSTEM_CARRIER_ID, INSYSTEM_TIME, CARRIER_ALARM, PASSING_MODE, CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL, CARRIER_ACTION_TIME, ALIAS, CLEAN_REQUEST, CONTAMI_ID
mapper.select: select CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL from CARRIER group By CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL order By CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL ASC
mapper.update:
update CARRIER
CARRIER_STATE = #{carrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREV_CARRIER_STATE = #{prevCarrierState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARRIER_TYPE_ID = #{carrierTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER_SHAPE_ID = #{carrierShapeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_AMHS_ID = #{currentAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_LOC = #{currentLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOST_ZONE_ID = #{hostZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHELF_NO = #{shelfNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREV_AMHS_ID = #{prevAmhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREV_CARRIER_LOC = #{prevCarrierLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORED_TIME = #{storedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CARRIER_EMPTY = #{carrierEmpty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAIT_IN_TIME = #{waitInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WAIT_OUT_TIME = #{waitOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INSYSTEM_CARRIER_ID = #{insystemCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSYSTEM_TIME = #{insystemTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CARRIER_ALARM = #{carrierAlarm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL = #{carrierActionCtrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARRIER_ACTION_TIME = #{carrierActionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where CARRIER_ID = #{carrierId}
mapper.select:
select SECTION, STATE.KEY, RGB_RED, RGB_GREEN, RGB_BLUE, OBJECT, DESCRIPTION from ( select case when (AVAILABLE = 0 and SYSTEM_STATE = 3 and COMM_STATE = 1 and CONTROL_STATE = 5 and AMHS_L_STATE = 1) then case when (ALARM_STATE = 1) then case when (CARRIER_STATE = 0) then 'ONLINE_NOTINSTALLED' when (CARRIER_STATE = 1) then 'ONLINE_INSTALLED' when (CARRIER_STATE = 2) then 'ONLINE_WAITIN' when (CARRIER_STATE = 3) then 'ONLINE_TRANSFERRING' when (CARRIER_STATE = 4) then 'ONLINE_WAITOUT' when (CARRIER_STATE = 5) then 'ONLINE_STORED' when (CARRIER_STATE = 6) then 'ONLINE_COMPLETED' when (CARRIER_STATE = 7) then 'ONLINE_ALTERNATE' else '' end when (ALARM_STATE = 0) then 'ONLINE_ALARM' else '' end when (AVAILABLE is null) then '' else 'OFFLINE' end as KEY, AVAILABLE, SYSTEM_STATE, ALARM_STATE, COMM_STATE, CONTROL_STATE, AMHS_L_STATE from ( select ENTITY_ID, CL.CARRIER_ID, CARRIER_STATE, PREV_CARRIER_STATE, CARRIER_TYPE_ID, CARRIER_SHAPE_ID, CURRENT_AMHS_ID, CURRENT_LOC, HOST_ZONE_ID, SHELF_NO, PREV_AMHS_ID, PREV_CARRIER_LOC, STORED_TIME, CARRIER_EMPTY, WAIT_IN_TIME, WAIT_OUT_TIME, INSYSTEM_CARRIER_ID, INSYSTEM_TIME, CARRIER_ALARM, CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL, CARRIER_ACTION_TIME, PASSING_MODE, CLEAN_REQUEST, CONTAMI_ID, MES_MESSAGE, SET_TIME from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by CARRIER_ID asc) rn , ENTITY_ID , CARRIER_ID , CARRIER_STATE , PREV_CARRIER_STATE , CARRIER_TYPE_ID , CARRIER_SHAPE_ID , CURRENT_AMHS_ID , CURRENT_LOC , HOST_ZONE_ID , SHELF_NO , PREV_AMHS_ID , PREV_CARRIER_LOC , STORED_TIME , CARRIER_EMPTY , WAIT_IN_TIME , WAIT_OUT_TIME , INSYSTEM_CARRIER_ID , INSYSTEM_TIME , CARRIER_ALARM , CARRIER_ACTION_CTRL , CARRIER_ACTION_TIME , PASSING_MODE , CLEAN_REQUEST , CONTAMI_ID from CARRIER
order by CARRIER_ID asc ) CL left join CARRIER_ATTRIBUTE_INFO on CL.CARRIER_ID = CARRIER_ATTRIBUTE_INFO.CARRIER_ID
) left join AMHS_STATE on CURRENT_AMHS_ID = AMHS_STATE.AMHS_ID
order by CARRIER_ID asc ) STATE left join GUI_COLOR on STATE.KEY = GUI_COLOR.KEY
select distinct CARRIER_ID from CARRIER where CARRIER_SHAPE_ID = #{carrierShapeId} order by CARRIER_ID asc
select distinct CARRIER_ID from CARRIER where CURRENT_LOC = #{portId} order by CARRIER_ID asc
